page.title: 17Local Businesses
page.content: {Mr.Stubbs _ Mechanic ==================== Mr.Stubbs is a person who mends cars, vans and trucks.Sometimes he does spray jobs on vehicles.He also makes {lead weights for fishing.}He uses moulds to make them.He makes little buck shots and he makes bigger lead weights.When he gets a load of rubbish he sets it alight and it burns away. Sometimes he takes motors out of cars and puts them back in again. _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ {Mrs.Griffiths _ Village Shop ============================ The shop was opened in{1770}and was one cottage. Later 2 neighbouring cottages were knocked through to make it a bigger shop. Mrs.Griffiths,who has owned the shop for 3 years,is the only fulltime person working there.She has 3 part time ladies and a cleaner.
